bug.author: George3d6
bug.summary: Predict fails when the probabilistic validator runs when predicting multiple outputs
bug.description: Title pretty much says it all, predict fails during the call to the probabilistic validator when predicting more than 1 target variable. Haven't tried replicating on more dataset, but even if it only happens occasionally it's pretty bad. This was working before, so it must have been a bug introduced in the last 1 or 2 months.

comments.comment: Closing this for now, as I might have miss-diagnosed the issue.
